Compatible with iOS 8 - 13

DynamicTimer will dynamically change the timer sound between "Stop Playing" and a ringtone. If there is any music playing when the timer goes off it will stop it otherwise it will play the ringtone you set up in the settings.

The music will also fade out when stopping.

Requested by /u/Asohailwahab on r/jailbreak

Configure options from Settings.

Added iOS 13 support
Added iOS 12 support Added settings page to enbale/disable DynamicTimer
Added "Auto-Lock" option (automatically locks your device after pausing the music) in the settings
